FieldPermissions.name: FieldPermissions
FieldPermissions.description: Represents the enabled field permissions for the parent PermissionSet.

Field.description: The field’s API name. This name must be prefixed with the SobjectType. For example, Merchandise__c.Description__c

ParentId.description: The Id of the field’s parent PermissionSet.

PermissionsEdit.description: If true, users assigned to the parent PermissionSet can edit this field. Requires PermissionsRead for the same field to be true.

PermissionsRead.description: If true, users assigned to the parent PermissionSet can view this field. A FieldPermissions record must have at minimum PermissionsRead set to true, or it will be deleted.

SobjectType.description: The object’s API name. For example, Merchandise__c.
